question: 拍手
sourceAnswer:

sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Hand</kanji>s <kanji>beat</kanji>ing together is actually <vocabulary>applause</vocabulary>. Though... you might be doing it wrong if you're actually beating them together.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
